Semaphore Documentation

Supported application stack

Semaphore can build programs based on Ruby 1.9 and Bundler. At the moment it fully supports the following:

Database engines

  • PostgreSQL
  • MySQL
  • SQLite
  • Redis
  • MongoDB

These are used typically with Rails 3.

Test frameworks

  • RSpec
  • Cucumber with Capybara and Selenium
  • Capybara Webkit
  • test/unit

You can also use any other, provided it’s configured in your bundle and you add a custom build command if necessary, including:

  • Jasmine
  • Minitest

Other tools available on request:

  • Poltergeist and PhantomJS
  • Sphinx
  • CouchDB

We have a number of open source test apps in various flavors that we use for verification. If your setup is different, we encourage you to read that page and contact us – we’d be happy to get your app building on Semaphore as quickly as possible.
